comment:
This movie is going to be a Flop. So is The Batman. They cost way too much to make, and it is highly unlikely that they're going to make their budgets back. Most movies are going to flop over the next few years - this isn't a comment on their quality. Theatre chains are on the edge of going out of business and them getting a bail out is going to be political suicide, and the ones that will remain will have a much more limited capacity  - so say 25% of the Theatres go out of business (which is looking like a best case scenario), but then of the remaining 75%, they're only at half capacity - so overall 37.5% of the potential box office is going to be available. Maybe they can get that up to a %50 potential box office compared to 2019 if they're diligent and lucky. But that's not enough to make back a $150M Hollywood Movie, unless that $150M is including EVERYTHING - the movie, the marketing, the tie ins, etc. So any movies made for a "normal" Hollywood budget are going to flop.

WB should shelve this movie entirely for 3-5 years. Don't even start filming until 2023 - and only then if it looks like it's going to be able to make money. If the situation is still dire by then (and it probably will be), 2025 might be a better year to start.
